name: GalaxyMotoCrossHD
description:
Awesome motorbike game for iphone and iPad where you can compete with other players and friends through 34 different levels. Feel the adrenaline while making flips and riding lightening bikes and boost your speed by getting those extra power boosts. Are you ready for some bike racing?

Features:
• 35 unique levels
• 5 unique characters
• Play with your Facebook Friends
• Best time records
